scenes.description: Hololive JP members perform 'Prism Melody' on the main stage.
Hololive ID members perform 'Show Them (Who You Are)' on the main stage.

subtitles.original: 未来の僕らに まだ見ぬ君に
subtitles.english: To our future selves, to you we haven't seen yet

subtitles.original: 伝えたいこと たくさんあるんだ
subtitles.english: There's so much I want to tell you

subtitles.original: 浮かべた今は 当たり前なんかじゃない
subtitles.english: This moment we've envisioned is not just ordinary

subtitles.original: 翼を広げさあ今 飛ぼう
subtitles.english: Spread your wings, now let's fly

subtitles.original: Take my heart 連れていくよ 光の真ん中
subtitles.english: Take my heart, I'll take you to the center of the light

subtitles.original: 夢の先へ はばたける 勇気は君の願い
subtitles.english: To the end of the dream, the courage to flap our wings is your wish

subtitles.original: みんなで繋いだ この奇跡が
subtitles.english: This miracle we've all connected

subtitles.original: 途切れないように 歌うんだ もっと高く 大きな声で
subtitles.english: I'll sing so it never stops, even higher, with a loud voice

subtitles.original: 僕らの未来へと どこまでも響け
subtitles.english: Towards our future, let it echo everywhere

subtitles.original: Prism Melody
subtitles.english: Prism Melody

subtitles.original: Show Them (Who You Are)
subtitles.english: Show Them (Who You Are)

subtitles.original: Once you just forget about the past
subtitles.english: Once you just forget about the past

subtitles.original: 'Cause in time it will never matter
subtitles.english: 'Cause in time it will never matter

subtitles.original: But the love we had I'm hoping it will last
subtitles.english: But the love we had I'm hoping it will last

subtitles.original: Bersama kita t'lah lewati
subtitles.english: Together we have passed

subtitles.original: Tawa dan canda jadi memori
subtitles.english: Laughter and jokes become memories

subtitles.original: Pastikan harinya cerah di masa nanti
subtitles.english: Ensure the day is bright in the future

subtitles.original: Do what you were meant to do
subtitles.english: Do what you were meant to do

subtitles.original: For it's time to make it true
subtitles.english: For it's time to make it true

subtitles.original: Together we can all stand
subtitles.english: Together we can all stand

subtitles.original: Your hand in my hand
subtitles.english: Your hand in my hand

subtitles.original: Forever hand in hand
subtitles.english: Forever hand in hand

subtitles.original: Wujudkan mimpi genggamlah yang kau cari
subtitles.english: Realize the dream, grab what you seek

subtitles.original: Terpancarkan la la la la
subtitles.english: Radiated la la la la

subtitles.original: Pancarkan sendiri
subtitles.english: Radiate yourself

subtitles.original: It's time to show them who you are
subtitles.english: It's time to show them who you are

subtitles.original: Just shout it from the mountain high
subtitles.english: Just shout it from the mountain high

subtitles.original: To the sky we go, we go
subtitles.english: To the sky we go, we go

subtitles.original: Bersama kita t'lah lewati
subtitles.english: Together we have passed

subtitles.original: Tawa dan canda jadi memori
subtitles.english: Laughter and jokes become memories

subtitles.original: Pastikan harinya cerah di masa nanti
subtitles.english: Ensure the day is bright in the future

subtitles.original: Cerahmu nanti
subtitles.english: Your brightness later

subtitles.original: Do what you were meant to do
subtitles.english: Do what you were meant to do

subtitles.original: For it's time to make it true
subtitles.english: For it's time to make it true

subtitles.original: Together we can all stand
subtitles.english: Together we can all stand

subtitles.original: Your hand in my hand
subtitles.english: Your hand in my hand

subtitles.original: Forever hand in hand
subtitles.english: Forever hand in hand

subtitles.original: Wujudkan mimpi genggamlah yang kau cari
subtitles.english: Realize the dream, grab what you seek

subtitles.original: Terpancarkan la la la la
subtitles.english: Radiated la la la la

subtitles.original: Pancarkan sendiri
subtitles.english: Radiate yourself

subtitles.original: Go so far
subtitles.english: Go so far

subtitles.original: Fly and show them who you are
subtitles.english: Fly and show them who you are

subtitles.original: Always sing it la la la la
subtitles.english: Always sing it la la la la

subtitles.original: Be who you meant to be
subtitles.english: Be who you meant to be
